H0.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. Morning Reviver

H1.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. Hangover Helper

H2.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. The Cure

H3.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. Hair of the dog
